PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-15872008-09-04,  ,  ND,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisORDER RESPECTING EX-GRATIA PAYMENTS TO VETERANS AND SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY WORKERS INVOLVED IN NUCLEAR WEAPONS TESTING OR NUCLEAR DECONTAMINATION which authorizes the making of ex gratia payments to compensate veterans of the navy, army or air forces of Canada and to science and technology workers attached to elements of the navy, army or air forces of Canada, involved in Nuclear testing or Nuclear decontamination of the nuclear reactor in Chalk River, Ontario.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0095 Publication Date: 2008-09-17
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER RESPECTING EX-GRATIA PAYMENTS TO VETERANS AND SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY WORKERS INVOLVED IN NUCLEAR WEAPONS TESTING OR NUCLEAR DECONTAMINATION which authorizes the making of ex gratia payments to compensate veterans of the navy, army or air forces of Canada and to science and technology workers attached to elements of the navy, army or air forces of Canada, involved in Nuclear testing or Nuclear decontamination of the nuclear reactor in Chalk River, Ontario.
